original_text: And it shall come to pass in the day of the Lord's sacrifice, that I will punish the princes, and the king's children, and all such as are clothed with strange apparel.
korean_text: 여호와의 희생의 날에 내가 방백들과 왕자들과 이방인의 옷을 입은 자들을 벌할 것이며

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
in the day of the Lord's sacrifice
that I will punish the princes
and all such as are clothed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 이방 옷을 입은 자들을
